name: Impact Terraformer
description:
Your colony's ship has traveled far away from home and you are now trapped on the only kinda-habitable moon in a system solar. Use your propulsion bots to throw asteroids on the moon and terraform it !

How to play: (because the gameloop and mechanics are a bit all over the place)

  • Propulse asteroids by clicking on the sides of them
  • Complete objectives by getting your atmosphere/station to the amounts desired
  • Asteroids have cristals of the color of the elements they have
  • If your atmosphere is full, a bit of every element will be ejected when a new asteroid collide with it
  • If the metal level is too high in your atmosphere it will become toxic, replace it quickly with good gas before the timer runs out
  • Min gas levels are = N:30 - O:20 - H:10

Dev work and some art/animation by me (Sigitang), first game on Godot !

Pixel art by LeBlizzard : Instagram

Music (not made for this specific project) by my good friend NuageSolitaire : Youtube Channel
